Package: com.jcatalog.grailsflow.messagebundle.i18n

[Java] Class SpringI18nMessageBundleProvider

      • com.jcatalog.grailsflow.messagebundle.i18n.SpringI18nMessageBundleProvider
      • All Implemented Interfaces and Traits:
        org.springframework.context.ResourceLoaderAware, org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean

        public class SpringI18nMessageBundleProvider
extends CachingI18nMessageBundleProvider

        It extends CachingI18nMessageBundleProvider for caching already loaded message bundles. For loading a message bundle this implementation uses Spring ReloadableResourceBundleMessageSource as base - then it will be used for creating SpringReloadableI18nMessageBundle. Note, that SpringI18nMessageBundleProvider.bundlesLocation and SpringI18nMessageBundleProvider.resourceLoader should be appropriate each other, i.e. resorce loader should can to load message bundle with using its name and the specified base path. For more information see Soring ReloadableResourceBundleMessageSource.

        Authors:
        Roman Denisyuk
        See Also:
        CachingI18nMessageBundleProvider
        SpringReloadableI18nMessageBundle
